title: DAX Fridays! #34: UNICHAR and REPT
excerpt: In todayâ€™s video I will show you  two new DAX functions: UNICHAR and REPT  UNICHAR DAX function allows you to display unicode symbols in Power BI and Excel.   REPT allows you to repeat text using DAX.  With both functions you can create a star rating visualization among other cool things.  Chris Web
